name: Dot Tank
description:
CURRENTLY IN ALPHA STATE

Fight a Brave tank Commander against an endless tide of Square Tanks. Battle with three different weapons with several upgrades. Fight 12 enemies with 5 troops and 7 tanks. Make sure you beware the Terminator Tank!!!! Fight bravery and tacitly to survive the most waves possible.

Credits-

Music By:  xDeviruchi
